page.title: 03A Mother's Working Day
page.content: What a busy life our mums have.Bonnies Mum, Sharon, gets up at 7.15 to help her get ready for school.At 8.45am she walks with her to school.Then Sharon takes her dog Kaz for a walk near Dymond Road.Sharon then does the house work before she comes to work,in the canteen in Hollington Junior School. Sharon usually cleans out the jugs and puts water in them.Most of the time she does the washing-up at work.At 3.00p.m.Sharon and her friend Maureen walk home together.Sometimes they go to the shops in Blackman Avenue. When Bonnie and her little brother get home Sharon starts to make the dinner. After dinner Sharon watches television and does her knitting.Her favourite programmes are Eastenders and Dallas. At 8.30p.m.Bonnie goes to bed. Sharon might then read.At 11.00pm. she is ready to go to bed.
